goal: Find the top 3 recent AI research papers on agriculture, summarize them, and store the output in a structured format.

results.title: Deep Learning for Crop Yield Prediction
results.summary: The paper 'Deep Learning for Crop Yield Prediction' focuses on applying artificial intelligence techniques to agricultural problems. It proposes innovative methods to improve efficiency, decision-making, and sustainability in farming systems.

results.title: AI-Based Pest Detection in Smart Agriculture
results.summary: The paper 'AI-Based Pest Detection in Smart Agriculture' focuses on applying artificial intelligence techniques to agricultural problems. It proposes innovative methods to improve efficiency, decision-making, and sustainability in farming systems.

results.title: Reinforcement Learning for Precision Irrigation
results.summary: The paper 'Reinforcement Learning for Precision Irrigation' focuses on applying artificial intelligence techniques to agricultural problems. It proposes innovative methods to improve efficiency, decision-making, and sustainability in farming systems.
